external_games.name: Idle Champions - Minute the Marut Familiar Pack

name: Idle Champions: Minute the Marut Familiar Pack
summary:
In this pack:

- Minute the Marut Familiar
- 6 Epic Potions of Speed
- 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
- 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
- 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath
- 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter
- 2000 Modron Component Pieces
- 1 Potion of Polish
